title: PinkPantheress Announces 2025 North American Tour Dates
description: The pop star will hit six major cities, notably performing two concerts each in New York City, Toronto, and Los Angeles. PinkPantheress Announces 2025 North American Tour Dates Jonah Krueger
author: Jonah Krueger
excerpt: PinkPantheress has announced new North American tour dates set for 2025, which she has dubbed "An Evening with PinkPantheress."
text: PinkPantheress has announced “An Evening with PinkPantheress,” a new run of “residency-style” 2025 North American tour dates. The jaunt will see the pop star hit six major cities, notably performing two concerts each in New York City, Toronto, and Los Angeles. The North American shows kick off on October 24th and extend through mid-November. See the full schedule below. Get PinkPantheress Tickets Here Tickets for “An Evening with PinkPantheress” go on sale to the general public on Friday, June 20th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. This will be preceded by several pre-sales, including an artist pre-sale (sign up here) beginning on Wednesday, June 18th, and a Live Nation pre-sale for select dates starting on Thursday, June 19th, both of which go live at 10:00 a.m. local time. In addition to the newly announced North American gigs, PinkPantheress is slotted to perform at Glastonbury later this month and has two Brixton shows scheduled for September (get tickets here). She will also make an appearance at this year’s Corona Capital festival. News of PinkPantheress’ 2025 tour follows the release of her recent mixtape Fancy That, which dropped in May. Read why we named “Tonight,” a single from that project, one of the best songs of the week after it dropped here. PinkPantheress 2025 Tour Dates: 06/25 – Pilton, UK @ Glastonbury Festival 09/18 – London, UK @ O2 Academy Brixton 09/19 – London, UK @ O2 Academy Brixton 10/24 – Brooklyn, NY @ Kings Theatre 10/25 – Brooklyn, NY @ Kings Theatre 10/27 – Toronto, ON @ Massey Hall 10/29 – Toronto, ON @ Massey Hall 11/01 – Chicago, IL @ Byline Bank Aragon Ballroom 11/05 – Los Angeles, CA @ The Wiltern 11/06 – Los Angeles, CA @ The Wiltern 11/12 – San Francisco, CA @ The Masonic 11/13 – Oakland, CA @ Fox Theater
html:
PinkPantheress has announced “An Evening with PinkPantheress,” a new run of “residency-style” 2025 North American tour dates.

The jaunt will see the pop star hit six major cities, notably performing two concerts each in New York City, Toronto, and Los Angeles. The North American shows kick off on October 24th and extend through mid-November. See the full schedule below.

Get PinkPantheress Tickets Here

Tickets for “An Evening with PinkPantheress” go on sale to the general public on Friday, June 20th at 10:00 a.m. local time via Ticketmaster. This will be preceded by several pre-sales, including an artist pre-sale (sign up here) beginning on Wednesday, June 18th, and a Live Nation pre-sale for select dates starting on Thursday, June 19th, both of which go live at 10:00 a.m. local time.

In addition to the newly announced North American gigs, PinkPantheress is slotted to perform at Glastonbury later this month and has two Brixton shows scheduled for September (get tickets here). She will also make an appearance at this year’s Corona Capital festival.

News of PinkPantheress’ 2025 tour follows the release of her recent mixtape Fancy That, which dropped in May. Read why we named “Tonight,” a single from that project, one of the best songs of the week after it dropped here.

PinkPantheress 2025 Tour Dates:
06/25 – Pilton, UK @ Glastonbury Festival
09/18 – London, UK @ O2 Academy Brixton
09/19 – London, UK @ O2 Academy Brixton
10/24 – Brooklyn, NY @ Kings Theatre
10/25 – Brooklyn, NY @ Kings Theatre
10/27 – Toronto, ON @ Massey Hall
10/29 – Toronto, ON @ Massey Hall
11/01 – Chicago, IL @ Byline Bank Aragon Ballroom
11/05 – Los Angeles, CA @ The Wiltern
11/06 – Los Angeles, CA @ The Wiltern
11/12 – San Francisco, CA @ The Masonic
11/13 – Oakland, CA @ Fox Theater
